amendment.description: An amendment numbered 73 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to reduce the salary of Elizabeth Klein, Director, Bureau of Ocean Energy Management to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 261 (Roll no. 574).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 261 (Roll no. 574).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
